title: Japan Producer Prices Change
description: Producer Prices in Japan increased 9.10 percent in October of 2022 over the same month in the previous year. Producer Prices Change in Japan averaged 1.52 percent from 1961 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 33.80 percent in February of 1974 and a record low of -8.60 percent in August of 2009. Producer prices change refers to year over year change in price of goods and services sold by manufacturers and producers in the wholesale market during a given period. This page provides - Japan Producer Prices Change- actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Bank of Japan
